column4: South Korea's Mando in talks to supply parts for Tesla's Model 3: source
column5: SEOUL Mando Corp  is in talks with Tesla Motors  to supply parts for its Model 3 car  an industry source said  as it seeks to join other South Korean firms supplying components for Tesla's more affordable electric cars.

column4: S.Korea's Mando in talks to supply parts for Tesla's Model 3 - source
column5: SEOUL  May 24 Mando Corp is in talks with Tesla Motors to supply parts for its Model 3 car  a person with direct knowledge of the matter said  seeking to join other South Korean firms supplying components for Tesla's more affordable electric cars.
